contentencoded: New York City has many tech hubs, but most revolve around the big money in downtown Manhattan. Now Harlem wants a piece of the action. There's a new co-working space there called Harlem Garage. Marketplace Tech Report host Ben Johnson headed uptown recently to get a tour of the spot, which opens officially in a few days. Ben was shown around by Ryan Young, who works for MicroOffice, the company that manages the space, as well as Clayton Banks and Bruce Lincoln of Silicon Harlem.

description: A new co-working space in Harlem aims to bring more tech to the neighborhood.
teaser: A new co-working space in Harlem aims to bring more tech to the neighborhood.
title: New York's next tech hub: Harlem
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, October 24, 2013
